synopsis: John, a volunteer doctor, finds himself on the run in a strange country when he tries to stop the rape of a drunk girl at the hands of an Australian man.
description: Somewhere in northern Laos, John works as a volunteer doctor at an NGO clinic. He's a dedicated man, clearly troubled by his past, desperate to make amends. However his desire to do right will mean going on the run when he tries to stop the rape of a young girl at the hands of a westerner and ends up killing the man.
title: River
